resources.string: ERROR: cannot be created image file. Try again.
We need write external storage permission to save your pictures
You gave access to write external storage. Thanks!
You permanently denied write external storage permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
We need storage read permission to show your pictures
You gave access to read external storage. Thanks!
You permanently denied read external storage permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
We need manage external storage permission to show your pictures
You gave manage external storage permission. Thanks!
You permanently denied manage external storage permission, please enable this permission in your settings to enjoy this app.
Error: File image cannot be created
Your device doesn\'t give access to the camera
Your device doesn\'t give access to the gallery
